sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function CartItem({ item, value }) { const { product_id, title, thumbnail, price, total, count } = item; const { increment, decrement, removeItem } = value; return (
product: {title}
price : {price}
decrement(product_id)}> - {count} increment(product_id)}> +
removeItem(product_id)}>
item total: $ {total}
); }
